mapper.insert: INSERT INTO forum_cafe (num, writer, title, imagePath, content, viewCount, regdate) VALUES (forum_cafe_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{imagePath}, #{content}, #{viewCount}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, imagePath, content, viewCount, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) nextNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) prevNum FROM forum_cafe) result1 WHERE num = #{num}
